mapper.update: UPDATE asm_attrs SET name = #{new_name} WHERE name = #{old_name} AND asm_id IN (SELECT asm_id FROM asm_parents WHERE asm_parent_id = #{parent_id})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p2.asm_parent_id FROM asm_parents AS p1 INNER JOIN asm_parents p2 ON p2.asm_parent_id = p1.asm_id WHERE p1.asm_parent_id = #{parent_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO asm_attrs (asm_id, name, label, type, options, required, value, large_value, mdate) VALUES (#{asmId}, #{name}, #{label}, #{type}, #{options}, #{required}, #{value}, #{largeValue}, now())
mapper.update: MERGE INTO asm_attrs (asm_id, name, label, type, options, required, value, large_value, mdate) KEY (asm_id, name) VALUES (#{asmId}, #{name}, #{label}, #{type}, #{options}, #{required}, #{value}, #{largeValue}, now())

UPDATE asm_attrs a1 SET a1.ordinal = (SELECT a2.ordinal FROM asm_attrs a2 WHERE a2.ordinal IN (#{ordinal1}, #{ordinal2}) AND a1.ordinal != a2.ordinal), a1.mdate = now() WHERE a1.ordinal IN (#{ordinal1}, #{ordinal2})
